data.message: I think a sorting method would be a great addition to facebook and other social media. That we can place certain genre's into personalized folders. Newsfeed would be less chaotic this way and messages of friends wouldn't get lost in the crowd of posts if you catogorize them. This should be an addon.

replies.message: Thanks for the suggestion, Pim. We're listening to all of the feedback we get from the Facebook community. If you have any more suggestions, please let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1V7ab0A. -Abby
Facebook If this was true, you wouldn't erase comments when people are trying to get help that Is NOT anywhere on Facebook...and especially not in the facebook help pages!
